title: Why do I play wrong notes on the piano when I know the music? - Quora

response.answer_text: I play lots of instruments and I do the same thing. That’s why I, like most musicians, don’t like to practice. That’s why practicing is so HARD. Because to practice, you don’t get to sound amazing, you have to slow down, look at the notes, and play the music a LOT, until you can play it through without ONE mistake. Then you can speed it up, and speed it up till it sounds like the amazing version we listen to!
Cause you need to practice. Knowing is not enough. Your fingers need to learn the piece - there's muscle memory involved.
